message: I think this is a fair split considering we both have a stake in the game. Let's finalize this deal!

Hi Alice, I'm proposing a 50-50 split which I believe is fair for both of us. Due to the 20% inflation that affects me each round, I needed to improve on your initial offer. This even split respects both our interests and allows us to conclude the negotiation quickly before further inflation erodes the value.
